Fixed up an old map of mine & released it, consider uploading it please ;)

This looks really nice. I would totally like to try this out. =D
Thanks for the notice! It has been uploaded to the server.

Better then forest :O!
I like the maps that have a feeling of detail, and yet, a feeling of imperfection. Not trying to offend ya, but I mean like, you can tell it was a custom mapper who made this, and yet, it has a high level of detail... type of thing. I get too hung up on gameplay or extra features to usualy add in details XD
I think the coolest part is the melon machine, it reminds ofthe good days of crummyCradle making bodies into bread and mega-c4's
